reviewtext: Certainly a better us of my hard-earned government pension.I spent about the same amount of money on my FIRST new car:a 1972 Chevrolet Vega -- boy! Was THAT a waste of $1875...spent the ame amount on my Canon binoculars, and CAN even seeSatelites pass by... if I'm patient.Imissd the asteroid last Friday, but Russia didn't. Sorry, THATwas uncalled for.Great bi-nos!
